page.title: 02Kilvey Hill
page.content: Kilvey Hill is situated on the East side of the city of Swansea and on the Southern end of the Swansea Valley. Kilvey Hill rises steeply from the docks area of Swansea bay and reaches {a height of 193 metres.} The River Tawe and its valley run along the western and northern sides of Kilvey Hill. {The greater part of the area we {surveyed consisted of rough hillside covered with a mixture of coarse grass, heather and conifers planted by the Forestry Commission. There is one farm, Carn-Nicholas which concentrates on improving the pasture for grazing. At the top of Kilvey Hill there is a large area for receiving and boosting television signals.
